summary: This is an automated email from the FBI's eFOIA system acknowledging receipt of a FOIA request. The request appears to be for information related to Jeffrey Epstein, referencing his date of death and other identifiers. The email provides standard instructions for checking request status.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The FOIA request is for information related to Jeffrey Epstein, referencing his date of death and other personal identifiers.

events.title: FOIA Request Submission
events.description: An individual submits a FOIA request to the FBI for information related to Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The document is an automated FBI eFOIA system email acknowledging receipt of a FOIA request.
The FOIA request is for information concerning Jeffrey Epstein, referencing his date of death and other personal identifiers.
The email provides standard instructions for requesters to check the status of their FOIA request via the FBI's electronic FOIA Library (Vault).
